Title: Patriotic compatriots of Hongkong and Kowloon mobilise, resolutely fight back the British imperialist provocation!
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Translation of Mao quote top right: Every country’s reactionaries are just like these fools. They persecute everything the revolutionary people do, ultimately, all we can do is to advance the people’s revolution even broader and even more fiercely.Text on the placard on the left: Quotation from Chairman Mao. Be determined, do not be afraid to die a martyr’s death, conquer all obstacles, go and strive for victory.This poster is from the second edition (July 1967).
